entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who is trying to defeat Voldemort.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is guiding Harry on his quest.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: An object that contains a piece of Voldemort's soul.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who is trying to return to power.

entities.name: bodies
entities.description: Dead bodies that are floating in the lake.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about the Horcrux and its potential danger.
Dumbledore plans to use fire as a means of defense against the bodies in the lake.
Harry will also use fire, as instructed by Dumbledore.
Dumbledore has a plan to take the Horcrux and deal with the bodies in the lake.
